code()

summary: The codes representing the value from a Microsoft Health vocabulary. remarks: Some values can be represented by codes in more that one vocabulary. If appropriate add coded-values from as many vocabularies as are relevant. returns: a HealthVault::WCData::Types::Codedvalue Array
